channel.title: Shaniko-Fossil Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Shaniko-Fossil Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End OR-218 East at OR-19
item.description: End OR-218 East at OR-19 in Fossil. Turn left for OR-19 north to Condon; left for OR-19 south to Spray. Continue straight on Washington St. for (Fossil) City Center.

item.title: OR-218 East Approaching OR-19
item.description: OR-218 East approaching OR-19 in Fossil.

item.title: OR-218 East - Fossil
item.description: Entering Fossil on OR-218 east. Fossil is the Wheeler County Seat.

item.title: OR-218 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-218 east. Distance to Fossil and Condon.

item.title: OR-218 East - Wheeler County
item.description: Entering Wheeler County on OR-218 East at the John Day River bridge.

item.title: OR-218 West at OR-293 West - Antelope
item.description: OR-218 West at OR-293 West in Antelope. Turn left for OR-293 West to Willowdale and Madras; continue straight on OR-218 for Shaniko.

item.title: End OR-293 East at OR-218
item.description: End OR-293 East at OR-218 in Antelope. Use OR-218 west to Shaniko; OR-218 east to Clarno and Fossil.

item.title: OR-293 East Approaching OR-218
item.description: OR-293 East approaching OR-218 in Antelope.

item.title: OR-19 South at OR-218 West
item.description: OR-19 South at OR-218 West in Fossil. Use OR-218 west for (John Day) Fossil Bends (Clarno Unit), Antelope, and Shaniko.

item.title: OR-19 South at OR-218
item.description: OR-19 south at OR-218 in Fossil

item.title: OR-19 South Approaching OR-218
item.description: OR-19 South approaching OR-218 to Antelope, Shaniko, and (John Day) Fossil Beds (Clarno Unit).

item.title: US-97 South at OR-218
item.description: US-97 south at OR-218 to Antelope and Fossil. Continue south on US-97 for Maupin, Madras, and Bend.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-218
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-218 in Shaniko.
